Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.network

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.network.VirtualView
public class VirtualView extends Object
For the Game Manager there is a one-to-one correspondence between client and virtual view. This class supplies the controller an interface to send data to the controller, masking network details. This is a sort of fabric method class that allows the Game manager to send Login, Lobby, Error and Generic messages to the client. For other types of messages managed in Play Message Reader class the sendMessage method is exposed in order to send them.
